course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Robotics Special Project: The NXP Cup National University Students Intelligent Car Racing 2020
course.description: The NXP Cup National University Students Intelligent Car Racing is a national competition for young engineers. Student teams will design and manufacture the racing model car for tackling different missions and challenges which are provided by the organizer. Normally, a project report is required. Enrollment in the project course may require instructor's approval. May be graded PP.

reviews.author: cred
reviews.comment_content: It was a robotics crash course what was especially very fun to participate in.
reviews.comment_teaching: Most of the courses and content are taught by a hands-on approach and self-taught online course material.
reviews.comment_grading: The grading is based upon the review of which you receive from your teammates. Thus it is necessary to work well with teammates and be on time for all the meetings.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is very tough with demonstrations every week. It is very tough to be accepted to this course but the experience is quite rewarding.
